content: easy and quick bookmark not only for cat lovers hook 1 75mm yarn 520m in 100g 100% acrylic fingering cat bookmark chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch double_crochet increase - 2 double_crochet in one decrease - 2 double_crochet worked together decrease x - number of stitches in a row it s made in joined rounds finish each round with a join and start from ch2 counted as the first double_crochet pattern by justyna kacprzak cute and kaboodle all rights reserved body and head 1 chain 3 12 double_crochet in the 3rd chain from the hook join 12dc 2 double_crochet increase x6 join 24dc 3 double_crochet increase x2 1 double_crochet around join 40dc 4 we start the head here chain 2 double_crochet increase x2 1 double_crochet double_crochet increase x2 leave the rest unworked turn 10dc 5 ch2 1 double_crochet decrease 1dc x3 turn 8dc 6 ch2 1 double_crochet chain 2 1sl st in the next double_crochet one ear made 3sc 1sl st ch2 1 double_crochet chain 2 1sl st in the next double_crochet the second ear made fasten_off tail join the thread in the place where you want to start the tail i started at 9 stitches from the head on the right side 1 chain 33 or more/fewer - depending on the desired length double_crochet in the 4th chain from the hook 5 double_crochet 3dc in the next double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of the next 22ch join with the body with a slip_stitch you re done pattern by justyna kacprzak cute and kaboodle all rights reserved
